mapper.select: SELECT b.no, b.sprint_no, b.user_id, b.title, b.detail, b.status, b.reg_date, b.mod_date, b.project_no, u.image FROM backlog b JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE sprint_no = #{sprint_no} ORDER BY b.reg_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT b.no, b.sprint_no, b.user_id, b.title, b.detail, b.status, b.reg_date, b.mod_date, b.project_no, u.image FROM backlog b JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE sprint_no = 0 and project_no = #{project_no} ORDER BY b.reg_date DESC LIMIT 10;
mapper.update: UPDATE backlog SET sprint_no = #{sprint_no} WHERE sprint_no = 0 AND no = #{no}
UPDATE backlog SET sprint_no = 0 WHERE no = #{no} AND sprint_no = #{sprint_no}
mapper.select: select * from burndown where #{nowTime} <= end_date AND #{nowTime} >= start_date AND no = ori_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO burndown (sprint_no, lapse, start_date, end_date, reg_date, mod_date, task, done_job) SELECT #{no}, 1, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, NOW(), NOW(), (SELECT count(*) FROM backlog WHERE sprint_no = #{no} AND status NOT IN ("done")), (SELECT count(*) FROM backlog WHERE sprint_no = #{no} AND status IN ("done"))

INSERT INTO burndown(ori_no, reg_date, mod_date, sprint_no, lapse, start_date, end_date, task, done_job) SELECT #{no}, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 9 HOUR), DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 9 HOUR), sprint_no, (select count(*) from burndown where ori_no = #{no}) + 1, start_date, end_date, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM backlog WHERE sprint_no = #{sprint_no} AND status NOT IN ("done")), (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM backlog WHERE sprint_no = #{sprint_no} AND status IN ("done")) FROM burndown WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT no, sprint_no, task, done_job, task + done_job AS total, DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%y-%m-%d') today, (select title from sprint where no = #{sprint_no}) title, DATE_FORMAT(start_date,'%y-%m-%d') start_date, DATE_FORMAT(end_date,'%y-%m-%d') end_date FROM burndown WHERE sprint_no = #{sprint_no}

SELECT b.no, s.project_no, sprint_no, task, done_job, task + done_job as total, DATE_FORMAT(b.reg_date,'%y-%m-%d') today, s.title, DATE_FORMAT(b.start_date,'%y-%m-%d') start_date, DATE_FORMAT(b.end_date,'%y-%m-%d') end_date FROM burndown b JOIN sprint s ON b.sprint_no = s.no WHERE s.project_no = #{project_no} AND b.end_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 day) AND b.start_date < NOW() ORDER BY b.sprint_no, today

SELECT count(no) as total, (SELECT COUNT(no) FROM backlog WHERE status = "done" AND project_no = #{project_no}) AS done_job, (SELECT COUNT(no) FROM backlog WHERE status <> "done" AND project_no = #{project_no}) AS task FROM backlog WHERE project_no = #{project_no}

select s.no, s.title, COUNT(s.no) AS total, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM backlog WHERE sprint_no = s.no AND status = "done") AS done_job FROM backlog b JOIN sprint s ON b.sprint_no = s.no WHERE s.project_no = #{project_no} GROUP BY s.no ORDER BY s.no;
